div.p: Great Basin paleoclimate lags insolation forcing. Phase wheel diagram (in ° relative to 23,000 yr precession cycle) showing phasing differences between June 21 insolation at 65°N and δ 18O ivc of the Leviathan chronology, positive phasing means δ 18O ivc lags NHSI. Labels are insolation substages and lags in years of Leviathan behind insolation forcing. See Table 1.
